vsParam:
Hmm...
If I adopt this method, then I need to use this formula...

Hmm... What's wrong with Sorel?
She's reading a reference book of wizardology, right!?

I am not sure... But Sorel is studying,
could it be an omen of something really bad!?

Hey, you! I heard that!
I'll study wizardry hard, okay!
Is it required for the next lesson?

Er, I am studying the wind wizardry.
I'll be able to fly when I master this wizardry!

No, it's not for my lesson...
I am studying the wind wizardry. If I master it, I'll be able to fly!

Right? But I haven't succeeded not even once.
I couldn't imagine the feeling of flying in the sky...

Er, imagine?
Why would you imagine?

Er... The key to launch a wizardry,
is to imagine the picture of using the wizardry in your mind...

Let's take fire wizardry as an example, you have to imagine the
picture of lighting a fire. And for the flying wizardry, you have
to imagine yourself flying in the sky.

Hmm~? Isn't this very easy to imagine?
Just flap to fly, flap, flap.

Ha-ha, that's because you have wings...
Is there a way to fly without wings?

Without wings... Ah, right!
Hehehe, I've got a good idea!

Think, there's a type of monsters floating in the air, right?
Perhaps we can find inspirations by observing them!

Uh——!? Hey, using monsters as a reference, are you serious!?
You'll definitely get attacked!

Hmm, it's alright.
I'll kill it if it dares attacking me.

Okay, you guys will help me, right?
For my wind wizardry... Please, guys!
